name: Jump Shot: The Insanely Accurate Adventure
name_original: Jump Shot: The Insanely Accurate Adventure
description:
this is my game entry for trijam#211

hope you like my take on the "insanely accurate" theme

I don't have enough time to create visual and sound for this entry, I'll try my best next time

Also I just want to tell that I am unable to playtest all the stages, so I am not sure if some of the stages are beatable :D
